SICOM Systems, Inc. is a full service point-of-sale company, headquartered in Doylestown, Pennsylvania, dedicated to the research, design, development, manufacturing, marketing and service of point-of-sale computer systems for the demanding Quick Service Restaurant (QSR) industry. SICOM provides its clients with a "full scope" enterprise package, from the cashier on through to comprehensive corporate reporting. SICOM also specializes in the design and manufacturing of integrated Drive Thru Speed of Service Timing, Order Confirmation Units (OCU), Customer Loyalty Software and Digital Menu Boards.
